text:
Happens at least with FF/Moz and Safari. Caused by wrong position of search-box
that overlaps the breadcrumbs. Various ways to resolve that problem, for
instance change text-align:right; to float:right; for #search in page.css. Not
tested with IE. This "fix" will move up the following block (#body), so one may
clear that one. HTML code and CSS need major sex-up I'd say....
creator: hubertus@groepper.com

text:
Created attachment 13711
changes text-align:right; to float:right; for #search in page.css
creator: hubertus@groepper.com

text: Maybe the patch can be applied for 1.2.1
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
